name: Carma Coin
description: Carma Coin is a frictionless, high-yield, deflationary BEP-20 token built on the Binance Smart Chain network.We have a unique 10% "tax" on all transactions that is approx split:5% between all holders as a holding reward 3% to the "Be Magical Fund" that buys supercars for giveaways, rest goes to charitable donations and burns 2% to our liquidity pool (making it easy to buy and sell anytime)
